DOC.brief_summary: This cohort study plan identify initiator oral anticoagulant use electronic claim data commercial insurance database quantify association anticoagulant choice ( warfarin dabigatran ) occurrence select outcomes patient non-valvular atrial fibrillation risk stroke .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : A recorded diagnosis atrial fibrillation ( AF ) . Initiation anticoagulant medication ( dabigatran warfarin ) . At least 18 year age date anticoagulant initiation CHA2DS2VAScScore > =1 Exclusion criterion : Patients miss ambiguous age sex information Patients document evidence valvular disease Patients le 12 month enrolment UnitedHealth Research Database precede date anticoagulant initiation Patients prior use oral anticoagulant
